data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Victoria, Australia that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Victoria, Australia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Victoria, Australia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Victoria, Australia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, help the people of Victoria, Australia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Over 36.31 percent of the people of Victoria are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, please remember the Thai people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Victoria, Australia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Victoria.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Victoria. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
